content: enhance your small accessories gifting using these stocking filler pouches they are perfect for holding chocolates small toiletries or trinkets and make your small gifts that much more special the pattern includes all three pouches which are worked to the same basic pouch pattern with different colour variations the pouch is one size but you could make the pouches bigger or smaller by using different hooks however i find that working in double knitting with a 3mm hook creates a good gauge so you can t see the gifts through the pouch you will need around 25g of yarn for each pouch but this is just approximate as there is no gauge for this project this pattern was tested by two people
